abilities.desc:
At the start of your turn, choose your Ammo: Incendiary, Toxin, or Tracer. You have the chosen Ammo effect until your next turn.
Incendiary: After each damage-dealing Action you perform, give each enemy dealt damage by that Action 1 Burning token.
Toxin: After each damage-dealing Action you perform, give each enemy dealt damage by that Action 1 Weakness token.
Tracer: You can see and target enemies through Fog and Walls. You have +2 maximum Range.

actions.name: Bombardment
actions.desc: This is a Gunslinger Action. Place a Trap into any space within range. Then, deal 2 damage to each enemy adjacent to, or on, that Trap.

actions.name: Bazooka
actions.desc: Deal 4 damage to an enemy within range, then deal 1 damage and give 2 Burning tokens to an enemy adjacent to you.
